Package modnlp.tc.dstruct

Class modnlp.tc.dstruct.BagOfWords extends java.util.HashMap implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

ignoreCase

boolean ignoreCase

Class modnlp.tc.dstruct.BVProbabilityModel extends TCProbabilityModel implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

ignoreCase

boolean ignoreCase

tTable

java.util.Map tTable
term table: ( term1 , [(doc_id1, No_of_occurrences_of_term1_in_id1), ..., (doc_idn, No_of_occurrences_of_term1_in_idn)], ... termk , [(doc_idm, No_of_occurrences_of_termk_in_idm), ..., (doc_idz, No_of_occurrences_of_termk_in_idz)]) where term is a String and the elements of its Map value are No. of occurences, indexed by doc_id's.

cTable

java.util.Map cTable
category table: ( cat1 , [id1, ..., idn] ... catk , [id1, ..., idn] ) where cat (the key) is a String and the elements of its HashSet values are Strings (the same type as IDs, above)

docSet

java.util.Set docSet

corpusSize

int corpusSize
corpusSize represents the number of documents indexed by this TCInvertedIndex. It should be equal to docSet at all times.

creator

java.lang.String creator

creatorArgs

java.lang.String[] creatorArgs

Serialized Fields

invertedIndex

TCInvertedIndex invertedIndex
All TC probability models must be based on an inverted index

The program that created this probability model
